description: Verify sorting functionality from cheap to expensive

steps.name: ProductCategoryPage: get product category page visibility status by locating page heading
ProductCategoryPage: open product type page by category TRIMMERS_SUBCATEGORY(trimmers)
ProductPage: get product type page visibility status by locating page heading
ProductTypePage: sort products list cheap to expensive
ProductTypePage: open products list page number - 3
ProductPage: get product type page visibility status by locating page heading
